As This Is One Of My Favorite Game, I Am A Little Biased. But When I Say This Game Is Amazing, I Am Not Lying. With A Great Story, And Gameplay That Makes You Rethink Everything You Know About Gameplay, I Reccomend This Game With A Passion. Characters Are One Thing, But This Game Let's You Make Friends. And This Is Just A Miniscule Amount Of The Greatness This Game Has

Portal 2 is the sequel to the original gameplay experience game, Portal. It's a simple game, there are puzzles, and all you have is your portal gun and your surroundings to figure how you get from start to finish. The game is widely considered classic and a "must-play." You can test out the portal gun's capabilities, you can invest with the lore of the story and secrets behind the laboratory you are trapped in, and there is much more. You don't even have to play the first game to understand Portal 2. The first game is basically the prologue to the second game. If you aren't into puzzles then this may not be the game for you, but you might change your mind once you invest yourself after 10 levels.
